text:
e="preserve">John Wesley (August 3, 1947 – September 7, 2019) was an American actor. He was known for his role in "Superhuman Samurai Syber-Squad", where he played the role of Principal Pratchert. He was born in Lake Charles, Louisiana. Wesley was also known for his roles in "Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot" and in "Hang 'Em High".
Wesley died on September 7, 2019 of multiple myeloma at the age of 71.

annotations.surface_form: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
